short_summary: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number T3033-230008 dated 2022-09-21 with a closing of 2022-10-20 at 2:00 p.m. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on 13-12-2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of TRANSPORTS CANADA, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of 36 totes of dust control product to be used on the gravel runways, taxiways and apron at the Cree airports of Waskaganish, Eastmain and Wemindji(Quebec), including the pick up of 58 empty totes, as detailed in the request for proposals.
